PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoolingTowerPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Cooling tower performance history attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Capacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Cooling tower capacity in terms of heat transfer rate of the cooling tower between air stream and water stream.

PropertyDef.Name: SumpHeaterPower
PropertyDef.Definition: Electrical heat power of sump heater.

PropertyDef.Name: UACurve
PropertyDef.Definition: UA value as a function of fan speed at certain water flow rate, UA = f ( fan speed).

PropertyDef.Name: Performance
PropertyDef.Definition: Water temperature change as a function of wet-bulb temperature, water entering temperature, water flow rate, air flow rate, Tdiff = f ( Twet-bulb, Twater,in, mwater, mair).
